description:
* Based on a love comedy shounen manga by http://anidb.net/cr7585 [Yoshikawa Miki].
16-year-old super-studier http://anidb.net/ch116670 [Umino Nagi], second-year student at the Meguro River Academy high school, was switched at birth. On his way to a dinner to meet his birth parents, he accidentally meets the brash, outspoken, http://anidb.net/ch116669 [Amano Erika], who is determined to make Nagi her fake boyfriend as she never wants to actually marry. But once Nagi makes it to dinner, he finds his parents have decided to resolve the hospital switch by conveniently having him marry the daughter his birth parents raised...who turns out to be none other than Erika herself!
Source: Kodansha

REGULAR.description:
Umino Nagi was swapped with another child at birth. He’s going to meet his real parents today, but on his way to school, he meets a girl who is threatening to die to get out of her engagement.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Watashi no Kareshi ni Narinasai yo
You`re Going to Be My Boyfriend.
私の彼氏になりなさいよ

REGULAR.description:
Nagi and Erika are now engaged, but Nagi can’t wrap his head around how loaded Erika is, and Erika seems to have concerns of her own.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: I`m Not Going to Marry You.

REGULAR.description:
Living together with Erika gives Nagi an opportunity to focus on exam prep, except when they run into trouble.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: You Aren`t Going to Beat Me!!!!

REGULAR.description:
Having scored higher than anyone else in his grade, including Hiro, Nagi decides to finally confess to her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Would You Please Go Out with Me...?
俺と付き合ってくれますか...?

REGULAR.description:
Hiro and Nagi begin studying together in the mornings, but unexpected circumstances put a wrench in their relationship.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Can We Do Our Morning Study Sessions Together...?
Issho ni Asakatsu Dekiru ka na...?
一緒に朝活できるかな...?

REGULAR.description:
Erika joins Nagi’s and Hiro’s morning study sessions to wingman for Nagi, and Hiro wants to come hang out at her place.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: I Thought You Live by Yourself.
一人で住んでるんだよね?

REGULAR.description:
Nagi invites Hiro to join his group for a school field trip. The group is plunged into chaos with the addition of a couple more members.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Is My Fate Going to Change?
運命, 変わっちゃうのかな?

REGULAR.description:
Sachi notices something going on between Erika and Nagi and decides to try to get to the bottom of it. Both she and Nagi are on the verge of a big decision.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Are You Going to Marry Him?
このまま結婚しちゃうの?

REGULAR.description:
Hiro and Nagi go on date at the amusement park. Sachi is not amused.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kuroshio ga Ore o Yonde Iruze...!!
The Kuroshio Currents Beckon to Me.
黒潮が俺を呼んでいるぜ...!!

REGULAR.description:
Sachi and Nagi go shopping together for a Mother’s Day gift, but they can’t think of anything their mother would appreciate.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Don`t Treat Me Like Your Kid Sister.

REGULAR.description:
Erika and Nagi are stuck in a power outage. Nagi goes to the front door to find an emergency kit, when the unthinkable happens.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: I Can`t Forget That Just Happened.
Nakatta Koto ni Nante Dekinai yo
無かったことになんて出来ないよ

REGULAR.description:
Nagi tries to redeem himself after embarrassing himself in front of Hiro on their amusement park date.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Not That I Like You, Yet.
好きじゃない, まだ

REGULAR.description:
Nagi is beginning to question his own feelings, and he has trouble even focusing on midterms.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Things Aren`t Quite Working Out, Are They?
なかなかうまくいかないねぇ

REGULAR.description:
Erika’s parents want her to come home if she fails her make-up exams. She asks Nagi for help, but it may not be that easy.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kabe wa Koeru Tame ni Aru!!
壁は超えるためにある!!

REGULAR.description:
Erika and Nagi walk around the festival together, and she shocks him with how out-of-touch she is.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: We Have to Tell Her... About Our Secret!
言うしかない, 俺たちの秘密...!

REGULAR.description:
Sachi is worried about Hiro, so she brings Erika along to follow her and learn about her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Want to Talk About It Now.
今の会話がしたいんです

REGULAR.description:
Erika, Hiro, Sachi and Nagi make plans to study at Erika’s vacation house, but there ends up being a slight change in the roster.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Nani ga Okite mo Okashikunai no de wa!!?
なにが起きてもおかしくないのでは!!?

REGULAR.description:
Nagi is hoping to do the test of courage with Hiro, but Erika takes him instead. Nagi can’t figure out what it is that’s bothering her.
Source: Crunchyroll

Erika reveals who it is that she’s been trying to reach through social media.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: You Must Have Noticed by Now.
もう気づいているんだよね...?

REGULAR.description:
Nagi discusses with Erika what he learned – or tried to learn – from her father.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: I Want to Grow Up Already!
早く大人になりたーい!!!!

REGULAR.description:
Having topped his grade in the term exams, Nagi confesses to Hiro once again.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s a Secret Between You and Me.
Watashi to Nagi-kun dake no Himitsu jan
私と凪くんだけの秘密じゃん

REGULAR.description:
Sachi can’t contain her anger at Hiro, who had suggested to Nagi that Sachi may have feelings for him.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Au Toki wa Ore mo Issho Da
I`ll Be with You When You Meet Him.

REGULAR.description:
The four return from their vacation, but Hiro wants to take a detour. Having learned that Sousuke is somewhere in Japan, Erika is determined to look for him.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: これからどうしよっか

REGULAR.description:
Yohei holds a birthday party and invites Erika. They have a discussion about family.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: All That Matters Is That You Two Are Happy
Futari ga Shiawase nara Sore ga Ichiban jan
二人が幸せならそれが一番じゃん
